website_summaries.verdict: This timeless toy received more than a dinosaur-themed makeover, as its convenient floor cover, durable design, and opening doors make this the best riding toy out there.
pros: Classic Cozy Coupe with dinosaur scales, spines, and toothy smile
Removable floor when kids can use foot power
cons: Quite a bit of assembly required

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions step by step
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids love this and fight over it all the time. It is not hard to put together as long as you follow the directions step by step. You can not use common sense and think well this goes here Im just going to put it there and save time. Do not do that or you will be taking it back apart starting over. Also make sure to put the spikes on the top on there before you put the roof on the car trust me. Over all this is a great little car and both my little guys love it.
customer_reviews.author: LocalGirl

customer_reviews.title: Wheels don't work
customer_reviews.text: No matter what, the front wheels will not stay straight. They end up sideways. My little guy is almost 2 and while he loves to sit in the car, he can move in it for just a few steps before the wheels turn and he gets out and straightens them himself.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: So stinking cute! The box it is delivered in is not huge which is nice when having to bring it inside. My husband put it together in about 30 minutes. Needed a screwdriver and hammer. The door of the car has a lock so your little one can't open the door and fall out while riding in it. Only one side of the vehicle has a working door. The "horn" of the car is a squeaker sound like a dog toy. Very good quality and we love it! Ordered it Saturday afternoon and arrived Monday at 11am. Love amazon prime! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morefield

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it! But took a while to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's first birthday, and he loves it! (Screams when it's time to hop out, that's how much he loves it). Its perfect since hes still too young to push himself around using his legs, so the removable tray to keep his feet enclosed is perfect until hes ready. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was that it took a while to assemble. And the pieces for that are associated to the same part were found in different packages, which was rather annoying. There were many packages and they all seemed to be jumbled in some unknown fashion to me....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Went to put together on Christmas Eve. I guess that was my mistake as there are 5 parts missing. Also the holes dont line up for putting the rest of it together.
customer_reviews.author: Unrulymama

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy anything like this ever again
customer_reviews.text: A pain to put it together!! It took me about 4 hours to assemble which was a struggle the whole time. I wouldn’t buy anything like this ever again! Little Tikes manual needs improvement overall. Unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Bright Colors, Great buy
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids have loved their Cozy Coupes. We bought this one because my daughter loves the color green. It was a huge hit. Well made, sturdy, and works indoors or out (carpet or hard surfaces, not made for grass). Easy to clean surfaces. Still fits my tall 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small, good size for kids under 3
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old and 4 year old. My 3 year old just turned 3 the same day we received this little car and he fits in there but barely, if he grows just a little more he probably won’t be comfy in it. My 4 year old is definitely too big for this car but he still manages to get in and drive it around lol but he does look cramped up in it. It is a cute little car but best for smaller kids like under 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amirah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Build Quality - Incredibly Hard to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The pieces did not fit together. A hole was drilled too far low on one side to be able to fit it together, so...late at night on xmas eve...I had to drill a hole to make it work and now its functional but looks terrible. Additionally how pieces come together are a bad design that requires two people to put it together at some steps. I build a lot of toys for my two children and this was the worst I've ever had to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Scratched & gouged, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It came in about 50 pieces. That pic is only half of them. The largest piece (body of the car) was scratched & gouged all over! See pics. If I could’ve gotten another before the bday party this would have been RETURNED. It took me an hour & 15 min to assemble. I’m not dumb & I used a battery operated screwdriver. The pieces fit perfect & snug in some places , others not so much. Besides ALL of the scratches/gouges the most disappointing part is the floor piece. IT IS NOT AS EASY TO INSTALL OR REMOVE as you might think from the photo. Nor is it yellow, it’s black.
customer_reviews.author: k m

customer_reviews.title: MISSING WHEEL
customer_reviews.text: Received product and only had 3 wheels in the box. I didn’t notice until I had almost put the whole car together.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hedlund

customer_reviews.title: Really cute when completed.
customer_reviews.text: Let's start from the end. Finished, it's sturdy and cute. But... The directions are very weak, unclear and confusing. I have put thousands of things together but this goes down as "one of those". Plan on lots of frustration as things don't line-up or seem not to go together but after you force them, they eventually do. When I encounter things like this I always sit there wondering who designs these things and what we're they thinking. This one seems like it made more sense while being constructed in computer software but the final product wasn't fully tested for assembly issues. Otherwise it is very cool once completed.
customer_reviews.author: Snivet Mattica

customer_reviews.title: Dino coupes are awesome
customer_reviews.text: The dino coupe is really cute and it's nice to have something different on the street, but assembling this was a pain. I definitely recommend paying the extra money to have it assembled as it will be well worth it. The coupe scratches easily, but it's made of plastic so what can you expect. Other than that, it's awesome. My son loves it, the foot board allows our kid to sit without dragging his feet until he's old enough to ride by himself.
customer_reviews.author: kjammer123

customer_reviews.title: He looooved it.
customer_reviews.text: We really hadn’t have a hard time putting this together as many reviewed. If you are able to follow normal instructions you will be ok. Just follow the instructions and you will hace NO problem. Although is a little time consuming and little details is not the end of the world. It took my husband and I like 1 hr and a half considering baby just playing around since first time he saw it. And we let him be around and be part of the moment. I have to say my toddler loved it lime i said since it came out of the box still in pieces. So I do. 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Santana

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than original
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it is smaller than the original. I have a 2 yr old and we bought this for him for Christmas. He is normal height and weight 28lbs but he can’t peddle bc his knees are hitting the steering wheel. Had to call and return product for the original bc it is several inches bigger all around.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves dinosaurs so this was a no brainer for me. She got it for her 2nd birthday and she fits perfectly inside. Everything works fine. The door even had a simple lock so she doesn’t go falling out. As with other ride in toys, be mindful of little feet dragging and getting stuck if someone is pushing. That could result in a nasty injury. The assembly was a little more involved than I had hoped and took about an hour or so from start to finish. Nothing too complicated just time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: CYH

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, terrible assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to follow which part was what without any labeling on the bags which are haphazardly sorted into random bags. Be better if each bag was for each page parts1 = bag 1 etc. Good thing I'm mechanically inclined but for most people, it might be hard to impossible to do yourself. Also the instructions are for the default red and yellow car so colors are confusing (on black and white print) with a different model color. Each model should have its own colors or better bag labeling as explained.
customer_reviews.author: Dances with Lions and Dragons

customer_reviews.title: Great find! Fun kids toy.
customer_reviews.text: Product does require assembly, but was really easy to put together. Once put together, it looked exactly like the picture. My son loves it! It has a squeakable horn, and 'ignition' that clicks when turned. Me, my partner, and son go for daily evening walks, and my son strolls in this the whole time. The 'handle' on the back of the roof of the car is a bit low. Anyone over 5'1" will have to lean to use it. Although, if secured correctly, its easy enough to push the car by the horns. I've recommended this little tikes car to many people, as I love it so much! It receives many compliments, as not many people have a dino car.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had the worst experience with this item i have never once been disappointed in anything I've ordered on Amazon until now. I waited over a week and half for my order with PRIME it was late! Not only was it late I didn't get alot of the parts for the toy I don't have a key so now there is a random hole and I don't have any safety pieces for the roof and back pieces so they will always pop put now and i didnt get the floor bored pices, didn't get the horn either and no eyes!!! I am very disappointed in this item and would never recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McCaughan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - Just get the original one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my son bc he loves dinosaurs & cars so how perfect... right? There was nowhere on the top for us to attach the “scales” or “horns” so you can’t even tell it’s a dinosaur which took away the excitement I think. Also I attached everything correctly & after being on the pavement for about half a mile the front wheel came off completely. I can’t get it to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: amberaestrother

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a birthday gift for my 2 year old. While he loves it and was so excited when his Dad finally got it together. However, it took an unnecessary long time to get it together. This is mainly do to the fact that most of the hardware was missing and my husband had to get creative to get this together. While I enjoy a good deal, I will think twice before ordering from Amazon Warehouse again, as I had expected a few scratches, dings and ALL the hardware to be included (or at least to be told it was missing).
customer_reviews.author: Ali L.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!  Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of trash I've ever purchased. DO NOT BUY!!! Who designed this? I hope I was shipped a ripoff or bootleg. None of the parts matched the instructions. We were shipped two R (right) side parts without a L (left) side part. Way to ruin Christmas for a 2 year old. The instructions are absolute garbage. I spent way too much time trying to assemble this hot mess of a toy. Shame....shame....D&D could write better instructions and I pray they die a terrible death.
customer_reviews.author: Endurs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty junky. All scratched up.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute pain in the butt to assemble. I’m handy, but this was way annoying. Holes did not line up. Front right wheel does not stay on the ground when pushed. Large body portion of the car is pretty scratched up. Looks like new plastic, but was definitely roughed up before delivery. See pics. Parts in bags seem brand new and are not scratched. Where is the YELLOW floor board? It’s black. The picture shows YELLOW. Very disappointed. Should be $30. Not $50+. And why the hole here on roof? See pics.
customer_reviews.author: TMac

customer_reviews.title: Toddler will love "driving it, caregiver will hate putting it together!
customer_reviews.text: Got this cute coupe for our toddler and she simply adores "driving"t and honking the horn. it's a well built coupe once you manage to put it all together with the help of youtube videos. It took hubbie 90mins to put together because the instructions are not clear so you waste time watching videos. The holes don't always match up and some parts of building it requires help from a second person. Overall we would recommend buying this even with the frustration of building it, since your sweet child will get hours if not years worth of play from it.
customer_reviews.author: YuChris

customer_reviews.title: Too small/bad front wheel design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons 3rd birthday. He got in and his legs were up to his chest just about. With the floorboard in there absolutely no room!!! The front wheels spin around so you have to keep fixing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cantara

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my 18 month old son. He absolutely loves it. He doesn't know how to make it go forward but he can definitely go backwards. the removable bottom is great. Only downside is how long it took me to put together on Christmas eve... the 5 glasses of wine didn't make the task any easier but it got done. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old as a birthday gift, he LOVES it. So happy with this purchase! Absolutely recommend this. Assembly was time consuming and there are many parts to putting it together but I YouTubed the steps and it walked my husband and I right through!! FYI- You do need a screw driver, hammer and to make it easier a drill to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Bp

customer_reviews.title: Assembly a little frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Lots of steps for a toy that ends up being fairly basic (but cute). If you miss a step in assembly, going back to fix it may be impossible. We missed putting on the door and could squeeze it in after roof was on, but missing putting on the hubcaps wasn't an easy fix so the wheels have a little slack without them. READ DIRECTIONS and plan on using a good uninterrupted hour to assemble. 1.5 year old likes it though.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppinMama

customer_reviews.title: Kids love em!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cozy coupe we have owned but the first I had to put together myself. The important part is my son absolutely loves it. Assembly was fairly straight forward and only took about 30 minutes to put together. The directions were slightly vague but I was able to figure them out easily. All in all, just as our last one, I’m sure this will last forever until we gift it away when he’s to old for it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dolamite

customer_reviews.title: How do you screw up that bad when packaging something
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this for my nephew's birthday! Went to put it together and literally half the parts were missing! No hardware, no instructions, no decals and no eyes! Basically all that I got was the body, roof, side supports and wheels! How do you screw up that bad when packaging something??
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod D

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: What a pain to put together! The directions were very limited and they were missing the part for the Dino part of the car. But after I finally got it all together, it’s great. My son LOVES the car. It maneuvers great and build well. We left the Dino spikes off the top because they didn’t sit on the top well...but doesn’t affect the car.
customer_reviews.author: Arriane Sitter

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to put together
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute car but putting it together was a nightmare. Absolutely NOTHING is labeled so you have to guess just by looking at the pictures on the directions. Almost all of the holes didn’t even line up so I had to make my own, the steering wheel does not fit securely so my toddler is constantly pulling it out. I had to create something on my own to make it stay in place. I would absolutely never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: almost seemed like a return
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves it, and it is really cute, I gave it 3 stars because it came scratched up and the box was beat up badly,almost seemed like a return, but I put it together, anyway, with it being an outside toy, I figured we can live with scratches, but paid way too much for it to be delivered like that,
customer_reviews.author: Customer of Amazon2

customer_reviews.title: Pieces are not cut right. Wheels don’t spin. Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give zero stars! None of the pieces to the roof fit together the way they’re supposed to. So this prevents me from being able to get the black pegs in to secure the roof down. Up to this point, I’ve also had to make my own screw holes because none of those line up either. That was an easy fix, but the roof not being able to stay on makes me beyond angry. Also, the front wheels do not spin so he can only drive forward and backward. This was a Christmas present. I purchased two of these and I don’t even want to open the second one.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne rapoza

customer_reviews.title: Sent without all the parts.
customer_reviews.text: I’m mad. This is the second time I have had to write about missing parts in this order. I wrote to you two days ago about the collar being missing to hook up Horn and steering wheel. Do I really have to return the item and reorder to get proper help with this. Please email me at javamecraazy@hotmail.com. This is so frustrating. My grandson cannot enjoy his birthday present. I am mad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old loves it. Came missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Looks as described, 1.5 year old enjoys it. Legs are perfect height with shoes on to Flintstone peddle. Rides well on carpet and concrete. Lawn is a bit difficult. Cup holders are a little deep and narrow, makes it hard for child to get drink out. Also cup holders are behind him seated, so he tries to turn around while in the car to access. Car door opens on one side, not both. Door does lock so it won't swing open. Package arrived missing ignition base so there's a large home in the console. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: If you're an engineer who owns a tool store, this is the car for you!
customer_reviews.text: This took about 5 hours to assemble, the first time. There were holes that were not drilled into the plastic, that we had to find drill bits large enough to use to bore the holes. We never got the steering wheel to fit correctly because the plastic piece holding it in was too weak to do the job. We've bought multiple parts to try to "fix" the flaws, currently working on trying to reattach the door. This is the 3rd part we've had to build or purchase to try to make this work. Son loves the car, even if he has to ride around without a door.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY NIGHTMARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this thing but it was a complete nightmare to put together with 2 people! The instructions they give you are basic at best, so I had to search the internet for some other poor sucker that had been where I was and made an instructional video. Once this thing was finally assembled (2 hours later) my kid has thoroughly enjoyed riding in his dino car! Also be careful if your kid wants to speed around in this sucker, it can be a little unstable .
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Finally went to put this together, after purchasing and putting it up for my sons birthday. It’s missing sooo many pieces. I can’t even assemble it. I don’t understand, the box was sealed up, maybe a factory error? In the garbage it goes. What a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Panda Monium

customer_reviews.title: Love this car!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 5 month old daughters favorite Christmas gift! She loves going all over the property in it. I love that they come with a floor board cause we wouldn't have purchased yet otherwise. She immediately grabbed the steering wheel when she first got in and keeps a hold of it while it's moving. The handle is a nice but I wish it came up higher cause I still have to lean over to use it. I also love that it's so affordable and we'll worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dino cozy coupe for my grandson's second birthday, and he loved it! As soon as he unwrapped it, he jumped in and started riding around the house. We had trouble getting him to stop long enough to open his other gifts! As for assembly, I am a 63 year old grandmother, and I had no trouble assembling it by myself. The directions are very clear. Each step includes both written instructions and diagrams. As long as you follow the directions, it goes together fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Don't even bother.
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute piece of garbage. Assembly is a nightmare with cheap plastic fasteners that bend and screws that are so long they go right through the roof. What a joke, do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This Dino Coupe is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his Dino Coupe! It is perfect indoors or out. He loves the little storage area in the back. The horn and steering wheel are so much fun! I bought the traditional coupe when his father was 2; still have it, but it was time for a new one! I hope this one lasts as long. Great find for a toddler who loves dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: Hope V

customer_reviews.title: All the parts.
customer_reviews.text: It only came with three tires. Makes it difficult to build for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: lynne shea

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy! But.....
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to put it together..because holes doesn’t line up...My husband own a construction company...He has many tools to make it work....He had to make new holes and used longer screws ...
customer_reviews.author: Gina Y..

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. It was difficult to assemble,some of the holes did not line up, and the instructions could have been much better. Was not as made as well as Little Tikes products that I've purchased in the past. Overall it is cute, and my grandson will love it. It just requires alot of patience to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cute car horrible to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little car and my 3yo is excited to play with it, but......biggest Pain in the *** to assemble! Instructions are the worst I’ve seen and I’ve put plenty of children’s toys and all kinds of furniture together. LittleTikes, DO BETTER!! I’m actually in such a bad mood after spending well over an hour putting this thing together.
customer_reviews.author: ZKC

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, fun design
customer_reviews.text: The cutest Cozy Coupe ever made! The floor board and the door lock are much needed additions and make riding in it much safer. I got it for my granddaughter and everyone loves the colorful, sturdy, fun design. Perfect size for age 1 up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome children’s car
customer_reviews.text: High quality children’s play car. Relatively easy to build for the most part but I needed and extra out of hands a couple times and I’m familiar with tools and building things like this. You will need a power drill to drive a Phillips screw bit if you want to make things easier for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Jared Clark

customer_reviews.title: Terrible assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has countless toys, bikes, etc and this toy took hours to assemble, most recent a Cozy Coup for girls. 1. Instructions were not in color nor did they indicate color variations making it extremely difficult to assemble. 2. Instructions were difficult to read and interpret.
customer_reviews.author: WestTexasConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Our son’s favorite first birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son’s first birthday and he loved and still loves it. It is probably one of his favorite toys. We love that there is a bottom piece that makes it so he can just sit in the car and not have his feet hanging out yet. Highly recommend setting aside an hour with a relative or friend to assemble (it did not take us that long, but just give yourself a good amount of time so you don’t feel rushed).
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Darling!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, little grandson loves this car! He's 1 and 1/2 years old, we got it for him for Christmas. He could not wait for his Daddy to assemble it and kept trying to climb inside at various stages of assembly. He absolutely LOVES it and scoots along well in it. His parents like the handle so they can push him around the neighborhood in it. It's super cute. It was a big hit for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmapink

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: So great! I love this little Dino. My sons father assembled it and he’s not that handy, so fairly easy. Except one of the wheels does not touch the ground from time to time. I can assure you that’s because of his assembly though. I take my son around my neighborhood in his new Dino and the pool. Dino always turns heads it’s a must.
customer_reviews.author: KATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Not quality I expected from company.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put together. Some of the holes were not drilled and the holes on top did not line up properly. Managed to get it together and it looks great but don’t know that it was worth the hassle except that Grandson loves it. The front wheels are not acting right. They are difficult to keep going. They don’t straighten out right. I recently bought an older original Cozy Coupe car second hand. It is so much better. More sturdy, rolls better. Disappointed in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great car!
customer_reviews.text: Took us about an hour to assemble with the help of an adult drink (or two). Easy to follow directions and great once completed! Love that it comes with the removable floor for younger kids to use. Our 9 month old likes to sit in it and our 3 year old loves to cruise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun car!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old absolutely loves this car! The insert over where his feet go is brilliant since he isn't a fan of using his legs to move the car himself. I really appreciate the lock on the door because he does like to go fast. I assembled it in about an hour, with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Very recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, excellent quality. It took a bit of time to put together, especially the wheels. But the end result was worth it. Our 1 year old son loves to ride in it, and the hand grip area on the top makes this easy, although adults have to bend over to push it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Khanh Le

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 year old gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 2 year old! He loves it! The dinosaur design is so cute. It’s not terrible to assemble. This is the second one I’ve assembled. The instructions are straightforward. We put the front wheels on backward but still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki182

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble but with patience you'll have an amazing little car
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying my son absolutely loves this dino car. Putting it together was a hassle as to he expected but they could make it easier and organized. All the parts are mixed up in different bags which really doesn't make any sense. Aside from the silly parts packaging and odd instructions the final product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This car comes with a extra plate to cover the feet hole.... it’s perfect for young toddlers (so they don’t fall through the hole). My son loves to sit in it while watching tv.... next summer he can move around in it.
customer_reviews.author: Libbe

customer_reviews.title: Great car, terrible assembly
customer_reviews.text: I have so many mixed emotions about this toy. My son loves it so much, it has provided hours of entertainment. I’m not giving it a 5 star review because it was absolutely terrible to put together. My husband is a carpenter and even he got frustrated and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy hard to assemble but oh so worth it,
customer_reviews.text: Crazy hard to assemble but oh so worth it, This was a huge hit, I bought three of these cars for my son, nephew and niece for Christmas. Only advice i will give is don't try to assemble right away, give yourself 30min or an hour and it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SSmith

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Dino Coupe for my grandchildren aged two and four. They LOVE it! They already had the Pretty princess pink Coupe, but now they can share. They trade off and take turns riding in each one. It's so cute to see them riding side by side! It took my husband and me a good hour to assemble, but it was worth it. Yes I do recommend this coupe.
customer_reviews.author: crizzy

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Coupe not so cozy
customer_reviews.text: I’m agreeing with the need for an engineering degree from MIT. This was a total bummer to assemble! The front wheels are wonky, one spins wildly the other too stiff causing tip overs. Conclusion: When you pass a yard sale, look for one already assembled!! And, if you truly like the people you are “gifting” this to, scroll to a different gift
customer_reviews.author: THEA

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash. Gift to your enemies.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a million pieces. Even the stickers required assembly. TINY. Perhaps for a doll and not an actual human child? Attempted to assemble, threw it back in the box it came in and printed a return shipping label. Would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: So cute! So many hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy for indoor or outdoor play. My one year old uses the platform thing and climbs in and out over and over without many issues. My five year old still fits and enjoys it just as much. Your child will love it! So far, it is holding up really well. The assembly is a little difficult, but once it’s over with, this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DISAPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited for my sons first Christmas this was suppose to be his big gift. Sitting here hoping I can make this work. Steering wheel came broken floorboard was not in the box, body of car scratched up a little and it came with plastic shredding in it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Front wheels do not go smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions, but the front wheel can not go smoothly. My toddler loved the car very much at first but got very frustrated soon because the car can not move smoothly. Contacted both little tikes and amazon, end up to return and replace it......Return is another long story, because UPS will not take the whole car without a box. I have to dissemble it or go to buy a big box....
customer_reviews.author: Gone with wind

customer_reviews.title: Cute lil Dino car
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. The spikes on top make it really easy for me to roll my 16 month old son around in our neighborhood comfortably. He adores going “bye bye” in his car. My husband did struggle getting this put together which is not usual for him as he is pretty handy with this kind of stuff. So far there’s been no issues with the couoe after 2 months of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money. Super cute and cool!
customer_reviews.text: Soo cool! So glad we went with the Dino for our Daughter. It’s unisex so it works if you plan on having multiple kids. Loved it so much, getting it for my niece for her 1st birthday! It was a little bit of a pain to put together but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra A. Landry

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Easy to assemble if you follow the step by step directions. My 9 month old got it for Christmas and loves it. The only thing I was not happy with is some of the parts were taped together with packing tape and left alot of sticky mess. I was lucky and had goo gone and was able to clean it. Not sure if it was just mine that came taped up like that.
customer_reviews.author: valerie allor

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not helpful
customer_reviews.text: This took me 2 hours to put together. It came with instructions but only instructions for the red and yellow tikes car. It also came with a video to look up online and still was for the red and yellow tiles car not the dinosaur tikes car. After struggling with some screws I ended up giving up to make it look alright but that didn’t matter didnt really need some of the pieces and it all worked out and my kids have played in it several times and it moves just fine. If it wasn’t for the amount of time it took me to put together and instructions I would of gave it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, my grandson 5 months old loves it. It would be easier to assemble with 2 people. But so worth it. The height at the area where you push from is only 30 inches, causing me to hunch over to push him in it (back Pain,old). So I built a extension out of PVC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love Dinos!
customer_reviews.text: This little car is SO cute. My toddler has a lot of fun with it. We actually keep it inside, and have had it for a couple of months now, but it seems like the taillight stickers are already wanting to peel off. That's the only complaint. Can we get replacement stickers?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Little Tikes
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the pieces didn’t fit correctly into the slots once screwed in, the screw markings were almost non-existent making it almost impossible to get the screws started. This is not the Little Tikes products I used to buy for my children when they were little. I bought 2 of these Dino Cozy Coupes for my twin grandsons since I thought they were the same company product!
customer_reviews.author: Pooch

customer_reviews.title: Stickers Peeling off
customer_reviews.text: Stickers are already peeling off less than a month after purchasing. It's like the heat is causing them to get gummy and start curling. It's not even the hottest part of the season and I keep these in the shade (shed during storms/bad weather).
customer_reviews.author: Daycare provider

customer_reviews.title: cute ride
customer_reviews.text: It’s so different from the usually red cozy coupe. It’s so cute I couldn’t pass it up. It shipped fairly quick and undamaged considering it was to internal. my husband had a fairly easy time putting it together. And my son has loved riding it since.
customer_reviews.author: jaydan skyy

customer_reviews.title: completely disappointed as this was a birthday gift for my 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: coupe came incomplete, without top cover. completely disappointed as this was a birthday gift for my 2 year old nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Crazy wheels but kid loves
customer_reviews.text: Love this cozy coupe just as much as our little guy 15 month old does. Only reason why I gave It 4 stars is that the wheels go crazy and won’t move when pushing them sometimes. Not the end of the world but can be a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany h

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little car! It is a bit of work to put together but we just read the instructions and kept at it. Our son loves it and we’ve gotten so many comments on how cute the dinosaur theme is.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was difficult because the holes wouldn't match up to the screws. The floor board came bent and the front right wheel is shorter then the left front wheel. A couple of stickers were dirty and not useable. Until we get a new front wheel my 2 year old can't ride in it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the cutest thing ever.
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his 2nd birthday and absolutely loves it. He barely got out of it on his birthday and has been driving it (backwards) around our patio ever since. It was by far his favorite birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: NicoldShoulder

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy for Your Little One
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun! I love the handle space in the roof for the parent to grab and the removable footboard. Despite the suggested age, we got this for our 6 month old and she loves it. Its quite a project to put together but the instructions are clear or you can watch the videos online.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Styfco

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a difficult
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my nephews 1st birthday and he loved it! The manual however wasn’t for the Dino car it was for the original red little tikes so my boyfriend struggled a bit trying to figure it out on his own. It took him around 2 hrs to assemble but in the end it was worth it! My nephew didn’t want to get out of the car throughout his birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Ashlytrs

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old son love his Dino ride! It’s perfect for indoor and outdoor. It was easy to assemble but pay close attention to the wheels. It’s easy to forget a step. Overall we’re happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WifeMomBoss

customer_reviews.title: Nice car
customer_reviews.text: Pain to have to assemble but a good little toy. Even with the scuffs, blemishes, and manufacture’s tape not coming off. It did bug me, but my tot does like it. overall still good.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. Its well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought each one of my 5 grandkids a cozy coupe. They last forever. And the kids love them . And in the rare occasion something breaks you can contact the company for replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: nancy fowler

customer_reviews.title: A pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: Not fun to build at all. By the time I was done I needed a beer or something. Missing the gas cap but other than that had all the pieces. My son loves it so it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great little car
customer_reviews.text: Great little car, has the option to allow the child to drive themselves with their feet or a shelf so they can be pushed in it without their feet dangling. The lock is also very nice so as to avoid any tuck and rolls while in motion.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good push car
customer_reviews.text: Great little car for kids! I like that is has a removable foot plate. It also is kind of a gender neutral design so both my kids can use it. My husband likes the hand grip to push it. We are definitely pleased with our purchase. It did take a little while to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Smith

customer_reviews.title: My 1 y/o loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son's first birthday and it's one of his favorite toys. Having the foot plate has been fantastic. He's comfortable enough to climb in and turn around, play with the horn, and climb out all on his own. After seeing his older cousins climb in without the plate, he was also comfortable doing the same and fell in love with it like a whole new toy. And as a parent, I love the dinosaur theme. It's just an overall fun car.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom2017

customer_reviews.title: Nice kids toy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I got the okay to buy this for my niece for her birthday I promised to construct it before I gave it to her. It took me a large glass of wine and 2 hours to put it together. Make sure you follow each step in order! It's not rocket science but it does take a little time to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandson, I was disappointed that the rider can’t steer it. Apparently they have never been steerable. My grandson LOVES it and so does his big sister, so it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: A great toy for the price tons of hours of play very good price would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift was easy to put together very durable have bought this brand before holds up well and children love this toy can’t wait to give it to my grandson for his first birthday
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eakin

customer_reviews.title: Functionality not good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and it was fairly east to assemble. But you cant steer it. Only goes straight. Because of that I find our kids lose interest quickly. And getting out is difficult for a 1 or 2 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy at all to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I would never recommend this just for the pure torture of putting it together. I would have paid double for it to come assembled. It would also be more safe with a lap belt. It’s cute after all the frustration but took me 1.5 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son's first birthday and he loves it! He enjoys honking the horn and being pushed around. His 3 year old sister loves it, too! She can push him or ride in it. It has a footboard that can be removed so she can also use her feet to move the car Flinstone style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!  The video helped to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Dino trike. It’s really cute when it’s finally put together. It took us several hours to put it together, though. We even used a video from Little Tikes to help.
customer_reviews.author: bunting

customer_reviews.title: Rolls smoothly, never tips over.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. He loves it, and uses it daily. It's very sturdy, never tips over. The wheels roll smoothly and turn easily. It is a great toddler ride-on. He loves the dinosaur theme, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dino coup car!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! Directions are good. We had finished assembling when we seen that there were video instructions online. I think they would have been more helpful. It went together quick and was hit with the grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Nana

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Cozy Coupe Dino – Amazon Exclusive
product_meta.description: Catch a ride on the Little Tikes Cozy coupe - Dino! Toddlers love this dinosaur riding toy both indoors and out. The kids' Dinosaur car is stylish and easy to maneuver. Plus this dinosaur riding toy has interactive buttons, a working horn, and durable tires. The cozy coupe - Dino encourages active play, imagination and the development of motor skills.
feature_bullets: The Dino cozy Coupe has a fun design, A parent push handle and a removable floorboard. Parents and kids will both love the ride!
Designed with a high Seat back and cup holders in the rear (cup not included). working horn. Moving, clicking ignition switch. Gas cap open and closes
Cozy rolls on rugged, durable tires. Front wheels spin 360 degrees. Weight limit up to 50 lbs. Assembly required

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,272 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
